func.title: SetName

param.name: name
param.desc: New name. If nil, the object's name is reset to the definition value or the original crew member's name.

param.name: set_permanent
param.desc: For crew members only: if true, the name is changed permanently in the crew info in the player file. There may be no duplicate names within a player file.

param.name: make_valid_if_exists
param.desc: Determines what should happen if a clonk of the same name already exists in the player's crew. If false, the function call will fail. If true, a unique name is created by appending a number.

func.desc: Changes name of an object or a definition for the duration of the round.

example.text: Scenario script: the highest ranking clonks of joining players get different names in this round.
Scenario script: In this round, wood will be called "Baumstamm".
